title: Stuck at honor level 0 for over 100 games
body:
I have been stuck at honor level 0 for many games, despite not having been chat banned since before the season ended. I have the screen flair for the end of season rewards to prove that. How long do i have to wait before I can start getting these hextech keys again? I've got so many chests but the key earning system is ridiculous if I can't earn any through honor anymore.

Please help.

replies.body: Your honor level can slow down if you have dishonorable matches!  I looked into this for you, and do see a few games that weren't the most positive.  :/  Feel free to hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our PB team can give you more context to help you get back on track!
